dmca.title: [ABUSE] Site has copied portions of my website and is violating copyright laws
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 17, 2005 3:27 PM
To: webmaster@phpbbforfree.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Site has copied portions of my website and is
violating copyright laws]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Site has copied portions of my website and is
violating copyright laws
Date:         Tue, 17 May 2005 00:37:05 -0400
From:         Morgan Thomas <webmaster@phpbbforfree.com>
To:         <copyright@theplanet.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>,
<legal@theplanet.com>



My name is Morgan Thomas, I am the owner of www.phpbbforfree.com
<http://www.phpbbforfree.com/> the website www.forumcreator.com
<http://www.forumcreator.com/> has copied portions of my main site at
www.phpbbforfree.com <http://www.phpbbforfree.com/> and I would like the
content which is violating copyright laws to be removed. The content to
which they have copied is copyrighted and therefore the site owner is
committing a crime.



I own a very large free forum host hosting over 30,000 phpbb forums.
Many other smaller hosts running the same script I bought have been copying
portions if not all of my site from the content on the main page to my aup
and tos. I have been going around informing different datacenters of this
fact and they have been acting accordingly by getting the infringing website
owners to remove the content or the server is pulled. In most cases server
pull was not needed. Please get back to me and let me know if any other
information is needed. I started my site in sept of last year and I
registered my domains for this site a year ago in anticipation of the
scripts release. Other websites that have copied my content include
www.phpbb4you.com <http://www.phpbb4you.com/> where I am currently in talks
with their legal department as that individual has blatantly copied my site
word for word.


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCilODvK/XpJs6oyURAtJKAKCdXAQL8P7yFzwOrEt2RsxFsThmEwCfdXdp
yGOa03AvWFE+eFS8KuMo3E0=
=GjyZ
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
